product.title: μCT 90 Benchtop microCT Scanner
product.summary: The μCT45/90 is SCANCO Medical AG’s upgraded line from μCT35/40/80, combining a smaller footprint with a larger sample chamber. It maintains high resolution (1.25 μm / 2.2 μm) and supports a 20/16-position auto-sampler for batch and unattended scanning. Ideal for ex vivo specimens (bone, teeth, tissue, materials) and various materials for internal structural and mechanical analyses. With contrast agents, it enables fine imaging of cardiovascular, urinary and digestive systems in animals. Widely used in orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, regenerative medicine, cardiovascular studies, materials science, geology and paleontology.

type.label: Type
lines: Fully shielded, no external shielding required

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; 5 µm focal spot (4/8 W); 20–90 kVp (preset/calibrated 45/55/70/90 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 8 µm (10% MTF); 2.2–180 µm nominal isotropic voxel size

options.label: Auto-sampler
options.value: Up to 16 sample positions (depending on max sample size)
